name: morphlex
author: Joel Drapper
description: A tiny, optimal DOM morphing library written in TypeScript.

scripts.build: bun run tsc && bun run prettier --write ./src ./dist
scripts.minify: bun run terser dist/morphlex.js -o dist/morphlex.min.js --config-file terser-config.json
scripts.prepare: bun run build && bun run minify
scripts.ship: bun run prepare && bun run test && bun run lint && npm publish
scripts.size: bun run prepare && bun run gzip-size ./dist/morphlex.min.js --raw --include-original
